document.full_text: barry bonds's former personal shopper became the first and only of the government's 23 witnesses at his federal trial to say she saw him receive an injection from his trainer.
document.title: former assistant testifies she saw trainer inject bonds
lines_and_colors: barry bonds's former personal shopper became the first and only of the government's 23 witnesses at his federal trial to say she saw him receive an injection from his trainer.
